abstract: Alvogen announces that CVC Capital Partners-led consortium of investors will acquire controlling stake in company, in deal that values Alvogen at around $2 billion including its debt.
lead_paragraph: The consortium, which includes Vatera Healthcare Partners and Temasek Holdings, will acquire a controlling stake in the New Jersey-based drug maker.

headline.main: CVC Capital and Investment Partners Acquire Stake in Alvogen
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Investor Group Takes Control of Drug Maker Alvogen

snippet: The consortium, which includes Vatera Healthcare Partners and Temasek Holdings, will acquire a controlling stake in the New Jersey-based drug maker.
